channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 11:47 Air alert in Kyiv city. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 11:47 Air alert in Kyiv city. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_city This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 11:28 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 11:28 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #m_Marhanets_and_the_Marhanets_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 11:20 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in: - Myrivska territorial community - Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community - Pokrovska territorial community - Chervonogryhorivska territorial community
item.description: 🟡 11:20 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region.
